title: (x) "sgh" extreme contrast modern serif - ITC Firenze (customised) {Mike Y}
author: wyndom

comments.content:
It's pretty similar to ITC Firenze, except that the 'h' looks customized.

- Mike Yanega

I can't find the font online, but it used to be in the Image Club Letterpress CD's. It's shown in the 'Homage to the Alphabet' book, for those who have it. If needed I can post a sample, since I have the Image Club font.

Maybe Mike F. knows where we could still get it?

- Mike Yanega

[Here is the sample](http://web.archive.org/web/20120203211448/http:/bowfinprintworks.com/SerifGuide/serifsamples/serif_fg/firenze_full.gif) from the Serif Font ID Guide.

- Mike Yanega

hmmm, is this available digitally?

thanks again guys

If you can get one of the old Image Club CD's, the font was on them. As I mentioned I have the font, but all I can offer is to set type you might need. You can e-mail me offline if you want to discuss that.

- Mike Yanega
My copy came bundled with a CorelDraw CD as FirenzeITC.
Yep. That is how I have a copy too.

firenze is correct. but it just started there and was torn apart and rebuilt.

i got my copy exactly as tiffany described.
